vote.title: Authorize (1) rescinding the Community Development Block Grant Contract - Public Facility Improvements Project contract awarded to City Square Arts Opportunity Center, LLC, previously approved on January 21, 2021, by Resolution No. 21-0246, to complete public facility improvements to the Forest Theater located at 1918 Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard; and (2) the funds to be reprogrammed for other eligible uses during the development of the FY 2024-25 Community Development Block Grant - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize (1) rescinding the Community Development Block Grant Contract - Public Facility Improvements Project contract awarded to City Square Arts Opportunity Center, LLC, previously approved on January 21, 2021, by Resolution No. 21-0246, to complete public facility improvements to the Forest Theater located at 1918 Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard; and (2) the funds to be reprogrammed for other eligible uses during the development of the FY 2024-25 Community Development Block Grant - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
